description.en: Aurea at Rashid Yachts & Marina, elegant marinafront living with panoramic views, luxury amenities, and seamless waterfront lifestyle in Dubai. Rising gracefully along the thriving promenade of Rashid Yachts & Marina, Aurea is where you can experience chic Marina living. Savor seamless access to historic landmarks and contemporary amenities, where vibrant energy meets serene waterfront. Framed by sweeping marina vistas, Downtown Dubai’s skyline, and lush green parks, Aurea is surrounded by yacth berths, parks, curated dining, retail, and leisure experiences that transform everyday life into something extraordinary.
A luxurious swimming pool for recreation and entertainment with stunning views
